Name: Novara
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This bittersweet, orange-pink cocktail may prove challenging for some.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Jamie Boudreau at Vessel in Seattle, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Novara contains 181 calories
